Traumas graves.name: Severe Traumas
Traumas graves.description: The PC can recover 30 hope points in exchange for a particularly severe mental injury, such as a major phobia or an effect occurring under regular circumstances (combat, pursuit, dialogue scene...).

Traumas insignifiants.name: Insignificant Traumas
Traumas insignifiants.description: The character can recover 10 hope points in exchange for a mental injury symbolized by a small circumstantial effect, such as a fear of a specific situation, a tic, or a new attitude.

Traumas lourds.name: Heavy Traumas
Traumas lourds.description: The character can recover 40 hope points in exchange for a heavy trauma that generally influences several characteristics.
